类 weka.core.converters.AbstractFileSaver
的使用

  • 使用AbstractFileSaver的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    weka.core.converters  
    weka.gui  
    weka.gui.explorer  

    • weka.core.converters中AbstractFileSaver的使用

      weka.core.converters中AbstractFileSaver的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ArffSaver
      Writes to a destination in arff text format.
      class  C45Saver
      Writes to a destination that is in the format used by the C4.5 algorithm.
      class  CSVSaver
      Writes to a destination that is in csv format

      class  LibSVMSaver
      Writes to a destination that is in libsvm format.
      class  SerializedInstancesSaver
      Serializes the instances to a file with extension bsi.
      class  SVMLightSaver
      Writes to a destination that is in svm light format.
      class  XRFFSaver
      Writes to a destination that is in the XML version of the ARFF format.
      返回AbstractFileSaver的weka.core.converters中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static AbstractFileSaver ConverterUtils.getSaverForExtension(String extension)
      tries to determine the saver to use for this kind of extension, returns null if none can be found.
      static AbstractFileSaver ConverterUtils.getSaverForFile(File file)
      tries to determine the saver to use for this kind of file, returns null if none can be found.
      static AbstractFileSaver ConverterUtils.getSaverForFile(String filename)
      tries to determine the saver to use for this kind of file, returns null if none can be found.
      参数类型为AbstractFileSaver的weka.core.converters中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void AbstractFileSaver.runFileSaver(AbstractFileSaver saver, String[] options)
      runs the given saver with the specified options

    • weka.gui中AbstractFileSaver的使用

      返回AbstractFileSaver的weka.gui中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      AbstractFileSaver ConverterFileChooser.getSaver()
      returns the saver that was chosen by the user, can be null in case the user aborted the dialog or the open dialog was shown

    • weka.gui.explorer中AbstractFileSaver的使用

      参数类型为AbstractFileSaver的weka.gui.explorer中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void PreprocessPanel.saveInstancesToFile(AbstractFileSaver saver, Instances inst)
      saves the data with the specified saver
